fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Mayer Brown Europe-Brussels LLP follows a wide range of EU policies and legislation, most notably trade and customs. However, most, or in some cases even all of our activities do not fall within the scope of the register.
